name: fleck
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small mark or spot: Blackbirds' eggs are pale blue with brown flecks on them.fleck of I got a few flecks of paint on the window. Synonyms
speck
speckle
Thesaurus: synonyms, antonyms, and examples
a mark on somethingmarkThe backs of the chairs have left marks on the wall.stainShe had grass stains on her white jeans.smearHe had smears of tomato ketchup on his shirt.smudgeNo matter how often I wash my hands, I leave smudges all over my phone's screen.blotchHe had blotches all over his face.speckShe looked through the old camera lens and saw specks of dust.

a small mark, esp. of a different color: I got a few flecks of paint on the window when I was painting the frames. fleck verb [ T ] us

Her hair is flecked with gray.
